title: Applications and Societal Implications of Artificial Intelligence in Manufacturing: A Systematic Review. (arXiv:2308.02025v1 [cs.CY])
abstract: This paper undertakes a systematic review of relevant extant literature to consider the potential societal implications of the growth of AI in manufacturing. We analyze the extensive range of AI applications in this domain, such as interfirm logistics coordination, firm procurement management, predictive maintenance, and shop-floor monitoring and control of processes, machinery, and workers. Additionally, we explore the uncertain societal implications of industrial AI, including its impact on the workforce, job upskilling and deskilling, cybersecurity vulnerability, and environmental consequences. After building a typology of AI applications in manufacturing, we highlight the diverse possibilities for AI's implementation at different scales and application types. We discuss the importance of considering AI's implications both for individual firms and for society at large, encompassing economic prosperity, equity, environmental health, and community safety and security. translated_title: 在制造业中人工智能的应用及其社会影响：一项系统性回顾
translated_abstract: 本文通过系统回顾相关文献，考虑了人工智能在制造业增长中潜在的社会影响。我们分析了在这个领域中广泛的人工智能应用，如企业间物流协调、公司采购管理、预测性维护以及车间监控和过程、设备和员工控制等。此外，我们还探讨了工业人工智能的不确定的社会影响，包括对劳动力的影响、工作提升和降低、网络安全性脆弱性以及环境后果。在构建了制造业中人工智能应用的分类后，我们强调了不同规模和应用类型的人工智能实施的多样性可能性。我们讨论了考虑人工智能对个体企业和整个社会的影响的重要性，涵盖经济繁荣、公平、环境健康以及社区安全。研究发现
tldr: 本文通过系统性回顾分析了人工智能在制造业中的应用及其潜在的社会影响。研究发现制造业中人工智能的应用多样性和不确定性，以及对劳动力、网络安全性和环境的影响需要被重视。
